alert.note: Alert for Chase; Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 8:03AM CDT until June 09 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Plymouth. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, More sections along Road A floods especially at the low water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 33.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Cottonwood River Plymouth 32.0 24.8 Sun 7 am CDT 32.6 33.4 33.1 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
